communications.subject: Washington Public Records Act Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Kennewick Police)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: Welcome to the Records Center!
communications.communication:
Greetings: 
Thank you for registering with the Kennewick Public Records Request Center.  Please log in to the Records Center to update any contact or password information and to track the progress of your request. Login: 149230-31844705@requests.muckrock.com If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may request a temporary password here: Request Temporary Password (https://kennewickwa.mycusthelp.com/WEBAPP/_rs/ForgotPassword.aspx) 
 IMPORTANT: When you submit a public records request, the City of Kennewick will respond within five business days. 
 
  *  POLICE RECORDS REQUESTS: Please email PolicePDR@ci.kennewick.wa.us (http://PolicePDR@ci.kennewick.wa.us) or call 509-585-4507. CITY or FIRE RECORDS REQUESTS: Please email PrREQUEST@ci.kennewick.wa.us (PrREQUEST@ci.kennewick.wa.us) or call 509-585-4578. 
 This communication (and any reply) is subject to the Public Records Act, RCW 42.56. The City of Kennewick is committed to transparency in government and we will provide our customers the fullest assistance possible when they request access to public records. Individuals wishing to obtain public records shall submit their requests in accordance with the City’s Public Records Policy which is available by visiting this link This is an auto-generated email and has originated from an unmonitored email account. Please DO NOT REPLY. SPECIAL NOTICE FOR GOVERNMENT INTERAGENCY REQUESTS (not public records requests): You may use the portal to message staff about the status of your request.

communications.subject: KENNEWICK PUBLIC RECORDS REQUEST L001289-071623
communications.communication:
Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau
MuckRock News,
DEPT MR149230 263 Huntington Ave
Boston MA 02115

RE: Public Disclosure Request # L001289-071623

Greetings:

The Kennewick Police Department is in receipt of your public disclosure request seeking:

1. All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

At this time our office is experiencing a change in personnel staffing. During this transition period, additional time is necessary to research, compile, review and copy records for your request. I estimate providing records on or before 8/4/2023. If we are able to provide a response sooner, or if additional time is necessary, we will promptly notify you.

All electronic copies are transmitted through our online portal. The current fee is $6.27 for the first 15 files. Our fee schedule is changing August 1 and we will advise you of the fee due at the time of our response on or before August 4. If you have any questions or need further assistance with this request, please contact me.

​
[cid:image002.png@01D9B88E.7BB6E1B0]<http://www.go2kennewick.com/>Krystal Townsend, CMC, CPRO
City of Kennewick, Management Services Department
Public Records Officer/Deputy City Clerk
O: 509.585.4578
[cid:image005.gif@01D05746.04552300]<https://www.facebook.com/pages/City-of-Kennewick-Government/334179970120815>   [cid:image008.gif@01D05740.DA166A90] <https://twitter.com/kennewickwa>     [cid:image009.gif@01D05746.04552300] <https://www.linkedin.com/company/city-of-kennewick>

This communication (and any reply) is subject to the public records act, RCW 42.56. The City of Kennewick is committed to transparency in government and we will provide our customers the fullest assistance possible when they request access to public records. Individuals wishing to obtain public records shall submit their requests in accordance with the City’s Public Records Policy<https://www.go2kennewick.com/DocumentCenter/View/7932>.

You can quickly access your request here: https://kennewickwa.mycusthelp.com/WEBAPP/_rs/RequestEdit.aspx?rid=24875&coid=

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Vehicular Pursuit Policies (Oxnard Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

communications.subject: [Records Center] Welcome to the Records Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau, 
 
Thank you for registering with Oxnard CA Public Records Center. 
 
Your Login ID is:  149201-13764608@requests.muckrock.com 
 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
 
 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may request a temporary password here: Request Temporary Password (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HY0DTWkKuIj-2BHi8wCt7a1DDaqndKxKCNzICgX9Dg25kz61SDCPzQjp1ZxSAHt-2F3INFx9Q2WL-2BJmIyCU4R1N7tO8-3DyGE1_9MsTbFgXExQ9lfeeKUdHoGDjdlR-2BpYOiTpW2n-2FKiY-2Bkwmivtt-2BfzIDS-2Blu95aoW-2Bbxi8Fnuff74vNBfFNswwVmk-2BeaqiYoELsU3z2qYWUvRzeaRXQibaVTVW44RyY1TS2Y1PMxle8-2B5TsSiHLFGBmzdPlBb-2BAJTxzE-2FaLGuL4aroA5zQO2euse4FbYkBf4Bwo-2FMrYlQbij6sd5rVWaqAj-2BNXw-2F9UcOFasqkXBnECK4Q-3D) 
 
Please login to "My Request Center" to update your account information, track the status of your request and receive requested records when they become available. This is an auto-generated email and has originated from an unmonitored email account. Please DO NOT REPLY.

communications.subject: POLICE RECORDS REQUEST :: P000119-071623
communications.communication:
Dear Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau: 
Your request was received in this office on 7/16/2023 and given the reference number P000119-071623 for tracking purposes. 
 Records Requested: 
Your request will be forwarded to the relevant department(s) to locate the information you seek and to determine the volume and any costs associated with satisfying your request. You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records in question. 
"To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All current policies maintained by the department regarding vehicle pursuits (also known as: car chase, vehicular response policy, vehicular pursuit procedure).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sydnee Coggins-Prioleau

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Foxnard-police-department-347%252Fvehicular-pursuit-policies-oxnard-police-department-149201%252F%253Femail%253Dpublic.request%252540oxnardpd.org&url_auth_token=AAAcqxr36IIhmvWwMNWye3y08OY%3A1qLFuC%3ArqIIkaHa4ZX3H-qUbEjPiHOMfDXsAJ570HgQ4oMl_5U" 
 
 You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. Again, thank you for using the City of Oxnard's Public Records Center. Please note, if your request for records was submitted on a weekend, holiday, or after business hours, it will be considered received on the next business day. 
City of Oxnard

communications.subject: [Records Center] POLICE RECORDS REQUEST :: P000119-071623
communications.communication:
--- Please respond above this line --- 

Good morning, 
All Oxnard Police Department policies are located online via our website under Transparency. Here is the link for easier access: https://sites.google.com/oxnardpd.org/department-policy-manual/department-policy-manual 
You can easily search for specific words to find everything we have related to vehicle pursuits. 
This was provided to you in my capacity as the Custodian of Records for the Oxnard Police Department and closes this request for information. 
Thank you, 
Beth Ward 
To monitor the progress or update this request please log into the Public Records Center (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HY0DTWkKuIj-2BHi8wCt7a1DC-2FYH0yBX7mFRZDd7GBPozsc-2BLnrQQapvWkCaGtCfDvpNR7Lc9QNzuQKPuVvuDOkXtZBCg0lMCb4ZGtwPosVIP8AAWT_9MsTbFgXExQ9lfeeKUdHoGDjdlR-2BpYOiTpW2n-2FKiY-2Bkwmivtt-2BfzIDS-2Blu95aoW-2BBTT2gw6i-2FqFsmE1E8QKSMNCpkQEOHf3VBkP5DHQdicHyBnEfwZ5gfSWDweAc9eCO0Xi8c5C0zRuhcNunIIG0wIejGKpOpti4P78FO0ePQq6igji-2B-2FY6pWUseQ-2F6tVB2h5qAjckZP03d6sYlEY1u86ve80ETMBOypTjrZvCdmGgcd44SSf6MO17Piw5WxS-2FuxXF-2B2od-2BBfGgbJyC1tYMXsehD-2Bli-2FI0jelGeSyl6qKdx-2FnhwAI5w-2FA35EOoS7xQeXZTtOBDhoaRriScxNpu95HBo5MeDQFHFQTHWSUGiHJb-2Bst31146aulT4tfTvJxwNo)
